actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to promulgate regulations to make the United States currency notes of a denomination of $20 or more traceable by electronic scanning.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to promulgate regulations requiring U.S. currency notes in denominations of $20 or more to incorporate a serial number which may be read by electronic scanning.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to promulgate regulations to make the United States currency notes of a denomination of $20 or more traceable by electronic scanning.
